author: Staff Reporter
text:
Hundreds of part-time teachers observed a fast on Tiruchi Road here on Monday pressing various demands, including service regularisation.

They also demanded maternity leave for women teachers and timescale pay. Part-time Teachers’ Association organiser Kumar said that there were 16,549 part-time teachers in the State.

They had been working for 12 and-a-half days a month for a meagre pay. “If the government failed to redress our grievances, we will launch an indefinite fast in Chennai from March 2,” he added. Part-time teachers from Oddanchatram, Palani, Dindigul and Natham took part in the fast.
title: Part-time teachers observe fast
